analyseAnax

Class FrequentationDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • analyseAnax.DAO<Frequentation>
      • analyseAnax.FrequentationDAO

  • public class FrequentationDAO
extends DAO<Frequentation>
    Version:
    2 This is the Dao for attendance, which allows to create, delete, update or find a attendance in the data base.
    Author:
    Anaximandro
